Package com.tibco.ep.buildmavenplugin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdministrationMojo
    Administer nodes
    BaseGenerateMojo
    Base class for code generation MOJO
    CheckTestCasesMojo
    Check for test cases.
    CompileEventFlow
    Compile eventflow
    CompileLiveView
    Compile eventflow
    ConfigurationSource
    Configuration source for assembly
    DeployFragmentMojo
    Deploy an application fragment
    GenerateEventFlowSourceMojo  
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on ep-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn ep:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    InstallProductMojo
    Install product zip and tgz artifacts if not already installed.
    Locker
    Utility class to lock a file / directory
    PackageApplicationMojo
    Build an application zip archive.
    PackageEventFlowFragmentMojo
    Build a EventFlow fragment zip archive.
    PackageJavaFragmentMojo
    Build a java fragment zip archive.
    PackageLiveViewFragmentMojo
    Build a LiveView fragment
    PackageTCSFragmentMojo
    Build a TCS fragment
    ProjectModuleData
    An object representing the module data: the list of interfaces and modules.
    SetResources
    Set resources
    StartNodesMojo
    Install and start nodes.
    StopNodesMojo
    Stop and remove nodes.
    TestEventFlowFragmentMojo
    Test a EventFlow fragment using sbunit.
    TestJavaFragmentMojo
    Test a java fragment using junit and surefire.
    TestLiveViewFragmentMojo
    Test a LiveView fragment using sbunit.
    UnpackFragmentMojo
    Unpack any fragment archives listed in dependences.
    UnpackNarMojo
    Unpack any nar (native archive) archives listed in dependences.
